mapper.sql: id, ptype_id, sort, creater, createTime, updater, updateTime, status, code, name, model, spec, unit, color, product_size, bar_code, provider, stock, price, buy_price, picture, pycode, custom1, custom2, custom3, custom4, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, time1, time2
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, pt.name, p.model, p.spec, p.product_size, p.stock, p.price FROM b_product p, b_product_type pt WHERE p.ptype_id = pt.id
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.name}, '%')
AND p.code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.code}, '%')
AND p.pycode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.pycode}, '%')
AND pt.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.productTypeName}, '%')
AND p.provider LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.provider}, '%')
AND p.price > #{product.lowerPrice}
AND #{product.upperPrice} > p.price
LIMIT #{from}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(p.id) FROM b_product p, b_product_type pt WHERE p.ptype_id=pt.id
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.name}, '%')
AND p.code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.code}, '%')
AND p.pycode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.pycode}, '%')
AND pt.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.productTypeName}, '%')
AND p.provider LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.provider}, '%')
AND p.price > #{product.lowerPrice}
AND #{product.upperPrice} > p.price
